◆ CFARCADSP_configEDMADopplerDomain()

static int32_t CFARCADSP_configEDMADopplerDomain ( DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_HW_Resources *  pRes,
DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_StaticConfig *  staticCfg 
)
static

Description
Configures EDMA in CFAR Doppler domain.Each tranfer copies all doppler bins, it repeats for all range bins in ping/pong manner.

Parameters
[in]pResPointer to hardware resources
[in]staticCfgPointer to static configuration
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0

Definition at line 155 of file cfarcaprocdsp.c.

◆ CFARCADSP_configEDMARangeDomain()

static int32_t CFARCADSP_configEDMARangeDomain ( EDMA_Handle  edmaHandle,
DPEDMA_ChanCfg *  pEdmaChan,
DPU_CFARCAProcDSP_StaticConfig *  staticCfg,
uint32_t  srcAddr,
uint32_t  dstAddr 
)
static

Description
Configures EDMA in CFAR Range domain. It copies all range bins for one doppler Line.

Parameters
[in]edmaHandleEDMA driver handle
[in]pEdmaChanEDMA channel configuration
[in]staticCfgPointer to static configuration
[in]srcAddrSource address of EDMA copy
[in]dstAddrDestination address of EDMA copy
Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0

◆ CFARCADSP_isObjectDetected()

static bool CFARCADSP_isObjectDetected ( uint32_t  rangeIdx,
uint32_t  dopplerIdx,
uint32_t  numDopplerBins,
uint32_t *  cfarDetOutBitMask 
)
static

Description
Checks if an object is detected at a given range index and doppler index.

Parameters
[in]rangeIdxRange index
[in]dopplerIdxDoppler index
[in]numDopplerBinsNumber of Doppler bins
[in]cfarDetOutBitMaskPointer to output bit mask (compressed list)
Return values
true- Object found in CFAR detection bit mask
false- Object not found in CFAR detection bit mask

◆ CFARCADSP_isObjectDetectedOnDopplerLine()

uint32_t  numDopplerBins,
uint32_t  numRangeBins,
uint32_t *  cfarDetOutBitMask 
)
static

Description
Checks if an object is detected at a doppler index.

Parameters
[in]dopplerIdxDoppler index
[in]numDopplerBinsNumber of Doppler bins (must be power of 2)
[in]numRangeBinsNumber of Range bins (must be power of 2)
[in]cfarDetOutBitMaskPointer to output bit mask (compressed list)
Return values
true- Object found in CFAR detection bit mask
false- Object not found in CFAR detection bit mask

static

HWA processing completion call back function as per HWA API. Depending on the programmed transfer completion codes, posts HWA done semaphore.

Parameters

Return values

◆ CFARHWA_cfarRange_AND_cfarDoppler()

uint32_t CFARHWA_cfarRange_AND_cfarDoppler ( DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_CfarDetOutput *  cfarRangeDetOutList,
uint32_t  numCfarRangeDet,
uint32_t *  cfarDopplerDetOutBitMask,
DPIF_CFARDetList *  cfarDetectionList,
uint32_t  cfarDetectionListSize,
uint16_t *  detMat,
uint16_t  numDopplerBins,
int16_t  selRangeMin,
int16_t  selRangeMax,
int16_t  selDopplerMin,
int16_t  selDopplerMax,
bool  andWithCfarDopplerOut 
)

Description
Logical AND operation on the two input lists, output is a list of cloud points detected in both domains.

Parameters
[in]cfarRangeDetOutListCFAR Range List of detected points
[in]numCfarRangeDetNumber CFAR Range detected points
[in]cfarDopplerDetOutBitMaskCFAR Doppler bit mask of detected points
[in]cfarDetectionListintermediate detection list
[in]cfarDetectionListSizeintermediate detection list size
[in]detMatDetection matrix
[in]numDopplerBinsNumber of Doppler bins (must be power of 2)
[in]selRangeMinMinimum range index value to be shipped out
[in]selRangeMaxMaximum range index value to be shipped out
[in]selDopplerMinMinimum Doppler index value to be shipped out
[in]selDopplerMaxMaximum Doppler index value to be shipped out
[in]andWithCfarDopplerOut1: Send out CFAR range point if it is CFAR detected in Doppler Domain 0: Ignore CFAR Doppler detections

Definition at line 634 of file cfarcaprochwa.c.

◆ CFARHWA_convHwaCfarDetListToDetMask()

void CFARHWA_convHwaCfarDetListToDetMask ( DPU_CFARCAProcHWA_CfarDetOutput *  hwaCfarDetList,
uint32_t  numDopBins,
uint32_t  numCfarDetections,
uint32_t  cfarDomain,
uint32_t *  cfarDetOutBitMask 
)

Description
Converts HWA CFAR Detection list format into bit mask format: word = (rngInd*dopFftsize+dopInd) >> 5 bit = (rngInd*dopFftsize+dopInd) & 31

Parameters
[in]hwaCfarDetListPointer to HWA CFAR detection list
[in]numDopBinsNumber of Doppler bins (must be power of 2)
[in]numCfarDetectionsNumber of detected points reported by CFAR
[in]cfarDomain0: CFAR in range domain, 1: CFAR in Doppler domain
[out]cfarDetOutBitMaskPointer to output bit mask (compressed list)

Definition at line 524 of file cfarcaprochwa.c.

◆ CFARHWA_prepareHwaRunTime()

int32_t CFARHWA_prepareHwaRunTime ( CFARHwaObj *  cfarHwaObj,
uint32_t  cfarDomain 
)

Description
Prepares HWA during run time. Configures common registers. If the HWA param sets are not reused, they can be programmed one time, and only this function has to be called during run time.

Parameters
[in]cfarHwaObjPointer to CFAR DPU instance
[in]cfarDomain0: prepare CFAR in range domain, 1: prepare CFAR in Doppler domain
Return values
EDMAerror code, see EDMA API.

◆ CFARHWA_triggerCFAR()

int32_t CFARHWA_triggerCFAR ( CFARHwaObj *  cfarHwaObj,
bool  loadDataToHWA 
)

Description
Triggers CFAR execution.

Parameters
[in]cfarHwaObjPointer to CFAR instance
[in]loadDataToHWAloadDataToHWA=1: triggers EDMA to copy data from L3 memory to internal HWA memory. EDMA then triggers HWA CFAR execution. loadDataToHWA=0: triggers HWA CFAR execution only since the input data is already in internal HWA memory.

Definition at line 469 of file cfarcaprochwa.c.

◆ HWAutil_configCFAR()

int32_t HWAutil_configCFAR ( HWA_Handle  handle,
uint8_t  paramSetStartIdx,
uint32_t  numRangeBins,
uint32_t  numDopplerBins,
DPU_CFARCAProc_CfarCfg *  cfarCfg,
uint16_t  detObjectListSize,
uint8_t  dmaTriggerSource,
uint16_t  hwaSourceBufOffset,
uint16_t  hwaDestBufOffset,
uint8_t  cfarDomain 
)

Configures ParameterSet for CFAR detection (The CFAR detection runs along range bins).

Parameters
[in]handleHWA driver handle
[in]paramSetStartIdxHWA parameter set start index
[in]numRangeBinsNumber of range bins
[in]numDopplerBinsNUmber of Doppler bins
[in]cfarCfgPointer to CFAR HWA configuration
[in]detObjectListSizeMaximum size of the list of detected objects
[in]dmaTriggerSourceDMA trigger source channel
[in]hwaSourceBufOffsetHWA memory offset with input data: log magnitude 2nd D FFT matrix
[in]hwaDestBufOffsetHWA memory offset with CFAR output results: List of detected objects as array of structures cfarDetOutput_t
[in]cfarDomain0: CFAR in range domain, 1: CFAR in Doppler domain
